snippet: The issue came to widespread attention last August, when Bay Area Rapid Transit in San Francisco shut off cellphone service in some stations to hinder planned protests on the transit system.
abstract: The issue came to widespread attention last August, when Bay Area Rapid Transit in San Francisco shut off cellphone service in some stations to hinder planned protests on the transit system.

headline.main: F.C.C. Reviews Need for Rules to Interrupt Wireless Service
